SELECT comp.`company_short_name`,comp.`company_name`,proj.`project_name`,proj.`create_by`,
FROM `t_company` comp LEFT JOIN `t_project` proj ON comp.`id` = proj.`company_id` AND proj.`status` = '1' LEFT JOIN `t_order` o ON proj.`id` = o.`project_id` AND o.`status` = '1' LEFT JOIN `t_settlement` sett ON o.`order_code` = sett.`order_id` AND sett.`status` = '1' LEFT JOIN `t_payment` pay ON sett.`id` = pay.`settlement_id` AND pay.`status` = '1' LEFT JOIN `t_credit` cre ON comp.`id` = cre.`company_id` AND cre.`status` = '1' WHERE comp.`status`= '1' AND
proj.`id` = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
proj.`is_completion` = false AND
proj.`is_completion` = true AND
(o.`delivery_status` = '0' OR sett.`supplier_settlement_status` = '2' OR sett.`settlement_delivery_status` = '2' OR sett.`bill_delivery_status` ='2' OR sett.`buyer_settlement_status` = '2' OR pay.`bill_open_status` = '2' OR pay.`approval_status` = '2' OR pay.`payment_status` = '2')
